wikipedia_page.main: Sir Henry James Alderson  (22 May 1834 – 10 September 1909) was a Canadian-British major-general in the Royal Artillery.

response: *Lieutenant-Colonel and Colonel (temporary Major-General) Henry James Alderson half-pay, Royal Artillery, Director of Artillery and Stores, War Office.
*Lt.-Col. and Col. (temporary Maj.-Gen.) Henry James Alderson  Royal Artillery, Director of Artillery.
